title: Heart Trouble
description: The fifth novel in an acclaimed series featuring cleaning lady/sleuth Callahan Garrity. Atianta takes time out from its pre-Olympic frenzy to obsess about the murder case of Whitney Dobbs. A boozy socialite, Whitney earned the wrath of the city when she killed a little girl in a hit-and-run. When Whitney is shot while doing her community service, Callahan is suspicious about the victim's ex-husband. Callahan gets help from her House Mouse cleaning team to track down one mean, mad killer A fast-paced, highly entertaining caper. - Louisville Courier journal Trocheck has an eye for the Southern icon, an ear for the musically Georgian phrase, and an aptitude for multidimensional characters. -The Atlanta +ournal-Constitution
author: Kathy Hogan Trocheck
